name: Sherlock Holmes
description: Very competent detective, who has a number of distinction for solving crimes in the city.

name: Dr. Watson
description: Assists Sherlock Holmes to solve crimes, very qualified to get paper work done while in the office.

name: Maria Gonzales
description: Maid supervisor in the Mansion for over 10 years. Black long hair, short and overweight, brown skin, wears black all the time and is a bit grumpy

name: Carey Mahoney
description: Security mall in the East-Gate Mall. Tall, bald with a moustache, islander body type, brown skin, wears uniform at work and hawaiian cothes in day offs

name: Eden Adams
description: Gardner at South Garden. Black skin, slim build, tall, wears a sombrero and dark green clothes at the garden, has some scars in his hands, and is humorous.

name: Tommas O'Neill
description: Train operator for the same route in the past 5 years. He wears a blue and white striped hat, blue shirt and jeans, short and overweight, has a long beard, and is bored most of the day.

name: Homer Smith
description: Homer is one of the city's homeless, skinny guy wearing dirty and old clothes, white skin, doesn't like to have showers, stinky and he has a dog. He's always aking for money.

name: Rick Cashier
description: Manager at the Pawnshop for over a year. He has white skin, red hair, wears jeans and a white shirt with red tie, smokes cigar and change his homour everyday.

name: Rose White
description: Pharmacist at the BB Pharmacy. She is blond, wears white dress, shirt and high heels, perfumed, and sometimes flirts with some people, she is a lovely person

name: Samar Kumar
description: An immigrant who owns mutiple petrol stations around the city. He has dark skin, tall, has a long beard, wears a turban, and white clothes, very friendly
